name: Park Hotel Kursaal

reviews.text: The hotel caters mainly to families. Extremely clean, very good food (buffet starters/vegetables + 1st course + 2nd course (both to choose from a 3-option menu) + fruit and at night some dessert. So you'll need to make your decision of 1st and 2nd course the day before, however no matter what you choose, the quality and quantity of the food has always been good). Soundproof rooms guarantee a good night sleep. Free Wifi access. Nice pool.
reviews.title: Nice hotel just across the street from the beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1 minute walk from the sandy beach (animation for kids good but a tad too loud at times...), 5 minute walk from the town centre. Don't expect a 4 star hotel... but definitely one of the best options in Misano and possibly all the Riviera Adriatica if you are looking for good value for money.
reviews.title: great location and a friendly welcome!

reviews.text: Definitely visit Gradara Castle in the evening (20mins away by car) and Mirabilandia theme park (40mins by car going north) for which discounted tickets are available at the reception of the hotel.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: we booked this hotel as we were going to Misano for the Motogp and it seemed quite close to the circuit. The hotel was absolutely perfect!!- just across the road from the beautiful well kept beach and only about 300 yards or so along to the main centre. The staff at the hotel were very friendly and helpful...special thanks to Brigette who was great at answering all our questions about the surrounding area! the hotel was extremely clean, from the rooms to the pool, very impressed. We only stayed B&B but the buffet breakfast was fantastic! This hotel is only a 40 minute walk to the Misano world circuit and was ideal, you can get a shuttle there but we decided to walk! We cant wait to go back next year and do you know one of the best things??......not one time share seller in site!!!! ha ha!! If you go to misano...you will not be disappointed with this hotel! FANTASTIC!
reviews.title: Very Pleasant Indeed

likes.liked: — Air Conditioning - Good View - Great Shower
likes.disliked: — They forgot to make my room up one day. Very high reaching wardrobes.

description: Only 10 kms from Rimini, Park Hotel Kursaal, a large hotel, recently refurbished, offers all modern comforts: satellite TV, Wi-Fi internet, A/C, fridge, hairdryer, safe. Also available: ample parking, shady garden, large open air swimming pool and wellness centre. On the seafront facing the beach, it is near to both Misano town centre and Portoverde marina which offer many restaurants, shops, clubs and pubs of every type. Only 2 kms away are the popular resorts of Riccione with its Spa and Cattolica. The hotel is easy to reach by public transport ??? bus and train (Misano Adriatico station), A14 motorway, exit either Cattolica or Riccione, Rimini Airport 8 kms away.
